an10.224:4.1: “Someone with forty qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.224:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, and meaningless. They’re covetous, malicious, and have wrong view. They encourage others to do these things. They approve of these things. And they praise these things.
an10.224:4.13: Someone with these forty qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.224:5.1: Someone with forty qualities is raised up to heaven.
an10.224:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless. They’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view. They encourage others to do these things. They approve of these things. And they praise these things.
an10.224:5.13: Someone with these forty qualities is raised up to heaven.”
